pullrequest.title: Fix gzclient startup crash with ogre 1.9

content.raw:
Yes I have updated that formula to 1.9 with some tinkering.

I thought the client crashed with the last message being `invalid drawbale`, but in fact it is just that the main window closes immediately after start. But it keeps running and I can for example open the topic visualization window.
content.html:
Yes I have updated that formula to 1.9 with some tinkering.

I thought the client crashed with the last message being invalid drawbale, but in fact it is just that the main window closes immediately after start. But it keeps running and I can for example open the topic visualization window.
